name: rpi-led-control
description: Use your Raspberry Pi to control 7 segment LED displays and LED matrixes that incorporate the MAX7219 chip. These devices are widely and cheaply available online. You can connect the displays to any 3 of the Raspberry Pi GPIO pins and you can daisy chain 8 of the devices together.
author: Seb Lee-Delisle <seb@leedelisle.com> (http://seb.ly)
